H0.text: Who wrote the 1866 novel ‘Crime and Punishment’. Leo Tolstoy

H1.text: Who wrote the 1866 novel ‘Crime and Punishment’. Nikolai Gogol

H2.text: Who wrote the 1866 novel ‘Crime and Punishment’. Gustave Flaubert

H3.text: Who wrote the 1866 novel ‘Crime and Punishment’. Dostoevsky

A4.text: Strakhov remarked that 'Only Crime and Punishment was read in 1866' and that Dostoevsky had managed to portray a Russian person aptly and realistically.
